titleStmt.title: By the Quene. Whereas the Quenes Maiestie by her proclamation dyd adiourne the terme of Saint Michaell last past ...
Proclamations. 1563-12-10
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation adjourning Hilary term to Hertford Castle because of plague.
Dated at end of sheet two: [G]euen at her Maiesties castell of Wyndsor the tenth day of December, in the syxt yere of her Maiesties raigne.
At foot of sheet 2: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Another edition of STC 7964, with the addition of the adjournment of the Court of Exchequer--STC.
Steele notation: of of 2) lyke- as.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
